attributes.action: Save the UK from the black hole of leaving the EU
attributes.background: The people of Britain have not been given the true facts regarding the UK leaving the European Union. Article 50, if triggered next week by PM Theresa May, will devastate our economy and make us a laughing stock amongst the world. Sign this petition to save yourselves and your children from BREXIT!

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister has now sent her letter notifying the European Council President of the UK’s intention to leave the EU, therefore it is unclear what action you would like the Government to take. 

You may wish to sign the following existing petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/181808
